creator: Playspace
descriptionHtml:
If you’re looking for a FREE online game to win crazy jackpots and meet new FRIENDS : play LOCO BINGO Online ! #1 in new bingo games 2019 🌟

📍 Download Loco Bingo for Free !
📍 Log in and discover a new Bingo world ! Travel around the rooms, in the mode you prefer : Bingo 90, Bingo 75 or Tombola 90.
📍 Play Bingo with lots of cards and WIN ! Get a line or a Bingo to win PRIZES and virtual money ! Go up in the levels, and become an expert !
📍 Participate in exclusive Bingo Tournaments !


How to play Loco Bingo Playspace ?

✔️Log in for FREE !

Register for free, join the Loco Bingo community and create your profile. When you want to play for the first time, a tutorial will show you how this free game works and the actions you can take: Buy Bingo cards, select the game mode and win prizes by getting a line or a full card . Remember that the game only works with an internet connection. 🎲
Play a funny Bingo game in UK !

✔️ Join the Bingo rooms in the best online multiplayer game !

Loco Bingo permits you to choose between 3 modes: The Tombola and the Bingo with 75 or 90 balls. Select one of the three, choose a room, and wait for the game to begin. When the balls start to appear, you have to be attentive to the card you put into play, to see the virtual money you are winning !
The more cards you play, the more chances you have to win BIG PRIZES !

✔️Invite your friends, meet some new ones and chat with them !

Our game permits you to see if your Facebook contacts are playing Loco Bingo, and invite those who still don’t have it to play together, online and for free !
Play SOCIAL BINGO ONLINE with friends !



✔️Get money to bet bigger at Bingo !

Every day, the game offers prizes : cards and virtual money through the Daily Bonus and Extra Bonus. Thanks to these gifts, you will be able to improve your bingo bets and enter new rooms !
Win crazy jackpots !

✔️Play free Slots machines !

The other way to increase your winnings to buy cartons is to bet small amounts of virtual money at the slot machine. If you win the jackpot, you will be able to buy more bingo cards.
Play slots games for free !



Key features of the Loco Bingo app

🔥 Loco BINGO Online is a multiplayer Bingo game, free and in English. Play this funny game easily from anywhere!

🔥 Free registration. Tha app allows you to register with Facebook.

🔥 The game offers the best slots machines and 75 and 90 balls Bingo game rooms, in addition to a Tombola mode.

🔥 Invite your friends and chat with them in a chat room inside the game.

🔥 Earn daily rewards and prizes to play without spending money.

🔥 Participate in the new Bingo tournaments, and social tournaments to get more prizes and meet more friends !


If you like online bingo, want to play from home and do not know which app or game is the best, download Loco Bingo from Playspace now and discover the best machines to play.

You'll never be alone: Chat with other players or invite your friends to play against them. Receive free daily rewards and bet on the slot machine to earn credits that you can then spend in the Bingo 75, 90 and Tombola rooms.

- Loco Bingo is for an adult audience.
- Loco Bingo does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
- Success in a social casino game does not imply the success at “real money glambing”

🍀Play Bingo online with Loco Bingo! Good luck! 🍀

descriptionHtml:
Do you want to play social bingo online & video bingo? If you are looking for Bingo games, slots online and casino games, Bingo Loco from Playspace is your best online bingo multiplayer choice.

Enjoy loco bingo, the #1 free online multiplayer social bingo and free slots games. Challenge your friends in the online Bingo 90, Bingo 75 and tombola rooms. Play free slots games for free and have fun with the best free video bingo and social casino games.

At Loco Bingo you will enjoy the best free slots games and casino games and various online casino games. Choose the online bingo multiplayer and tombola tickets you want to bet on and pick your lucky ball. You can win lots of bingo and slots prizes by playing online bingo from home.

At Loco Bingo you will find different board games such as free puzzle games, and other card games online.

How to play Loco Bingo from Playspace?

Sign up for free bingo and video bingo & slots!
Register for free in the Loco Bingo online bingo community. Once in the game, a tutorial will show you how this free game works and what social bingo actions you can perform in the online bingo multiplayer and slots game: buy bingo cards, select the game mode: Bingo 90, Bingo 75 and Tombola and win social casino and social bingo prizes by calling online bingo or Loco Bingo. Remember that this free social casino game does not work without an internet connection!

Invite friends to bingo online and chat live with them in the new live bingo chat!

In addition to all the traditional bingo games options, Loco Bingo allows you to play free online social bingo and video bingo with your friends. You can play for free roulette, lottery online and other casino mini-games for free. Meet new people in the new mega online bingo chat and slots chat.
Collect free money online to gamble at the best free online social bingo and slots casino in the UK!

Collect through the Daily Bonus the free gifts that Loco Bingo has for you: bingo cards, virtual money, credits, slots money... and many more free bingo and casino prizes! Win the lottery, Vegas-style slots and video bingo with your Loco Bingo gift and bet in the new Loco Bingo free online bingo multipayer rooms.

Remember that by playing free online bingo you can level up and win lots of prizes.

Play free online slots machines to win extra coins online! Get a lot more coins online by playing our free online slots machines! Bet virtual money on free slots and slots machines and you can buy many more bingo online tickets! Also enjoy our Botemania; Vegas-style online casino mini-games, Slots machines, free poker, cards, lottery, roulette, sweepstakes, chess, Monopoly and more!

Main features of the Loco BINGO online app:
Loco Bingo social casino game is one of the most popular free online multiplayer games. Play for free this online social bingo from anywhere!
Free social game in English. The app allows you to connect from Facebook
The game offers the best free vegas-style slots and bingo machines and 75 and 90 ball Bingo rooms, plus a "Tombola" mode and video bingos online.
Invite your online bingo friends and chat with them in a Loco Bingo live chat room within the game.

Win free prizes and daily rewards so you can play online bingo without spending any money.

This game is aimed at an adult audience.
The game does not offer "real money gambling" or any chance of winning real money or prizes.

Playing or betting on social casino games does not imply subsequent success in "real money gambling".

The game is free to play but allows you to purchase real money items from within the app. It is possible to remove this option by going to Settings-> General -> Restrictions, and disabling "In-app purchases".
Follow us on Facebook, Instagram and twitter so you don't miss out on the latest bingo games, our best videos and get in touch with us.

Remember, you will need an internet connection to play our online Bingo.
